article.title: Searching the Galaxy
article.content:
Welcome to the comprehensive Galaxy search interface. This page contains two queries, which run concurrently. The first one is a Google Custom Search Engine that will search all things Galaxy. This includes all the pages on the Hub, the codebase (Galaxy and related projects), the mailing lists, the online help forum, and more. The other query is a Zotero-powered search isolated to the Galaxy publication library.

If you haven't already, enter your query into the box in the masthead, and results will appear below.
